item.title: Introducing Gracie Tracker!
item.description: [Web Application] 🇺🇸 Your Personal Martial Arts Training Companion 🇨🇳 您的个人武术训练伴侣 🇪🇸 Tu Compañero Personal de Entrenamiento en Artes Marciales Table of Contents Overview | 概述 | Visión General System Architecture | 系统架构 | Arquitectura del Sistema Tech Stack | 技术栈 | Stack Tecnológico Core Features | 核心功能 | Características Principales Technique Progress Tracking | 技术进度追踪 | Seguimiento del Progreso Técnico Fitness Tracking | 健身追踪 | Seguimiento de Ejercicio Class Schedule Management | 课程安排管理 | Gestión de Horarios de Clase Note Taking System | 笔记系统 | Sistema de Toma de Notas User Interface Guide | 用户界面指南 | Guía de Interfaz de Usuario Navigation | 导航 | Navegación Key Screens | 主要界面 | Pantallas Principales Security Features | 安全功能 | Características de Seguridad Getting Started | 入门指南 | Comenzando Overview | 概述 | Visión General 🇺🇸 Gracie Tracker is a comprehensive web application designed to help martial arts practitioners, particularly those studying Gracie Jiu-Jitsu, track their training progress, manage workouts, and organize their learning journey.
